name: The Tree of Life: A Bug RPG
name_original: The Tree of Life: A Bug RPG
description:
Tree of Life is a text-based RPG made in Twine with currently about an hour of content.

Play as a Young Beetle and interact with a wide variety of bugs as you venture to the top of a great tree! Battle through various insects with the help of allies to learn the many secrets of the world you thought you knew.

Current Build Ends ~50% through the story. No current bugs to my knowledge.
